pages.text: The modpack has a couple of mods which make the process of farming crops and trees much simpler.

pages.title: Improved Hoes
pages.text: This mod makes higher tiers of hoes till larger areas at once.

pages.title: Keep My Soil Tilled
pages.text: This mod keeps soil tilled under a pumpkin or melon attached to a stem.

pages.title: Random Bone Meal Flowers
pages.text: When you bonemeal grass, you have a chance to get $(o)any$() flowers, not just one or two types!

pages.title: Extended Bone Meal
pages.text: Grow netherwart, cactus, vines and sugarcane with the use of bone meal. instant grow crops while holding the sneak button.

pages.title: Kelp Fertilizer
pages.text: Makes kelp act exactly like bone meal. This works both when a player right-clicks a crop and when used in a dispenser.

pages.title: Tree Harvester
pages.text: If you crouch while breaking the bottom block of a tree, you will harvest the entire thing at once.

pages.title: Botany Pots
pages.text: The $(item)Botany Pot$() which is a block that can grow all kinds of crops. The (Upgradable) Botany Pot can be used for decoration, and to also make farming certain types of crops much easier. 17 different colors!$(br2)Hopper Botany Pot upgrade allows the pot to harvest itself and put items in a chest or other block with an inventory.
